Class Bo2DeploymentInfoUtility

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.utils.Bo2DeploymentInfoUtility

public class Bo2DeploymentInfoUtility
extends Object

Runtime manager info. Use it for sanity checks.

getRealManagerNameForAlias

public String getRealManagerNameForAlias(String managerName,
                                         String deplPath)
Gets the real manager name for an alias in the specified Bo2 deployment. If the name supplied is not an alias, it returns the name. If the name does not exist, null is returned.

Parameters:
managerName -
deplPath -
Returns:
Concrete manager name.

getRealManagerNameForAlias

public String getRealManagerNameForAlias(String managerName)
Gets the real manager name for an alias. If the name supplied is not alias, it returns the name. If the name does not exist, null is returned. The managers of the default Bo2 deployment are considered.

Parameters:
managerName -
Returns:
Concrete manager name.

getManagerNames

public List<String> getManagerNames()
Returns the manager names of the default deployment. This does not include aliases.

Returns:
Manager names.

getManagerNames

public List<String> getManagerNames(String deplPath)
Returns the manager names of a deployment. This does not include aliases.

Returns:
Manager names.
